rdf:Description.dc:title: Knowledge-XML internal application RDF attributes
rdf:Description.dc:description: Application specific attributes used internally to facilitate the archive management

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The owner of the qualified resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Authorized readers
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Entities authorized to read the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Authorized writers
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Entities authorized to write the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DTD name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the DTD associated with the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DTD URL
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The URL of the DTD associated with the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: New content identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the new content of the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Old identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The previous identifier of the current resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Removed identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the removed resource
